channel.title: [pi] help make my chatbox ect. transparent like when in fullscreen / resizable
channel.description:
I wanna make my chatbox and inventory ect. the transperant look like when in fullscreen or in resizable mode. I been messing with this for about 3 hours and cant figure it out. its for a pi 317 if you know how to fix this or know a tutorial on it please comment below please no flamers seems to be all the response I get.
I want it to be transparent when your not in fullscreen or resizeable.

item.description:
